__TOC__

'''You can use this page to nominate items for discussion by the ForumCouncil.'''

Forum Council meetings will be held in <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-meeting|#ubuntu-meeting]]</nowiki> on irc.freenode.net 

Our next meeting will be held <nowiki>[[https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Forum+Council+Meeting&iso=20170319T20&p1=%3A&ah=1 | 19th March 2017]]</nowiki> (this is subject to change). In general we aim to meet the 3rd Sunday in the month at 20:00UTC.
